review: Love the idea but execution is lacking...and it doesn't look like Amazon is responding to the issues.Any time I try and stream I get reloading and stumble issues, do not have the same problems with my iPad or wii.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent!!  I use it mostly for streaming movies and tv.  To this point it has worked flawlessly and I can control it from my iPhone.  It has a clear picture and no lag except for when I use Hulu.  The only thing that I don't like is that it has to stay plugged in.  I understand it and it doesn't change my opinion that this is an excellent piece of technology, but I would like it if I didn't have that extra cord.  I recommend this for everyone.  It is great!
author: Nicholas Music

review: Very happy with this purchase.  Interface is easy to use and speed is excellent.

review: Very pleased. And hope someday we can buy an appp that will allow us to watch live sports, such as ice hockey. Will we be able to ad updates to our Fire stick when they ad new apps?  Thanks

review: I am amazed at what I get for this very affordable purchase. I've had Netflix and Huluplus for several years but the upgrade automatically received by using the Fire TV Stick is worth every penny. Navigation is much easier; I'm getting more out of the pay services for the same price. Movie options seem endless. Additional channel options including games like pinball are the icing on the cake. I'm very happy I decided to purchase a Fire Stick.
